Text:
indeed vholdso, same with the silver-back gorilla ... assumed a myth until finally found ... this of course doesn't mean bigfoot is real but it certainly has to be considered possible until proven impossible ... 

and who knows what's way down deep in the ocean? lots of possibilities still on this planet to explore and discover ... the people who discount this kind of thing are usually the people who think we are the height of intelligence and advancement in the universe too ... we ain't ... and if we are, i am very very sad
